content: Hello - are the slides/videos from DevDays available online yet?
The video editing may take a week or 2 (mainly because of the number of presentations), DevDays attendees will receive an e-mail update when they have been published.
Are there any stats on attendance: # of attendees, what organizations sent people?
470 people. I don't know whether HL7 would publish more stats than that...
575 people attending, actually... The list of attendees is distributed among the attendees.

Are there any stats on attendance: # of attendees, what organizations sent people?

I believe all attendees got an email entitled Helpful Information for June 2019 FHIR DevDays. From @Mary Ann Boyle and it had a link to the list of attendees and their associated organizations.
Hello Benson. We will be sending out the final attendee list with the links to the slides very soon.
